perturbation.original_text: The Association, in accordance with and pursuant to its plan of conversion adopted by the Board of Directors of the Association (the "Plan"), intends to be converted from a federally-chartered mutual savings and loan association to a federally-chartered stock savings bank and will sell all of its issued and outstanding stock to the Company.
perturbation.changed_text: The Association, in accordance with and pursuant to its plan of conversion adopted by the Board of Directors of the Association (the "Plan"), intends to be converted from a federally-chartered mutual savings and loan association to a state-chartered stock savings bank and will sell some of its issued and outstanding stock to the Company.
perturbation.explanation: Federal regulations dictate the conversion process and oversight for federally-chartered savings and loan associations, implying a 'state-chartered' conversion introduces conflicting jurisdiction and uncertainty.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Home Owners' Loan Act (HOLA) and related Conversion Regulations

perturbation.original_text: The obligations of Capital Resources pursuant to this Agreement shall terminate upon the completion or termination or abandonment of the Plan by the Company or the Association or upon termination of the Subscription and Public Offerings, or if the terms of the Conversion are substantially amended so as to materially and adversely change the role of Capital Resources, but in no event later than 45 days after the completion of the Subscription and Public Offerings (the "End Date").
perturbation.changed_text: The obligations of Capital Resources pursuant to this Agreement shall terminate upon the completion or termination or abandonment of the Plan by the Company or the Association or upon termination of the Subscription and Public Offerings, or if the terms of the Conversion are slightly amended so as to indirectly change the role of Capital Resources, but in no event later than 180 days after the commencement of the Subscription and Public Offerings (the "End Date").
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'substantially amended so as to materially and adversely change' to 'slightly amended so as to indirectly change' introduces ambiguity regarding the threshold for termination. Also the 'completion' was changed to 'commencement', creating uncertainty about when Capital Resources' role ceases.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles regarding clear and unambiguous termination clauses.

perturbation.original_text: The Association is now a duly organized and validly existing federally-chartered savings and loan association in mutual form of organization and upon the Conversion will become a duly organized and validly existing federally-chartered savings bank in capital stock form of organization, in both instances duly authorized to conduct its business and own its property as described in the Registration Statement and the Offering Prospectus; the Company and the Association have obtained all material licenses, permits and other governmental authorizations currently required for the conduct of their respective businesses; all such licenses, permits and governmental authorizations are in full force and effect, and the Company and the Association are in all material respects complying with all laws, rules, regulations and orders applicable to the operation of their businesses; and the Association is in good standing under the laws of the United States and is duly qualified as a foreign corporation to transact business and is in good standing in each jurisdiction in which its ownership of property or leasing of properties or the conduct of its business requires such qualification, unless the failure to be so qualified in one or more of such jurisdictions would not have a material adverse effect on the condition, financial or otherwise, or the business, operations or income of the Association.
perturbation.changed_text: The Association is now a duly organized and validly existing federally-chartered savings and loan association in mutual form of organization and upon the Conversion will become a savings institution in capital stock form of organization, in both instances authorized to conduct some business and own some property; the Company and the Association have obtained some licenses, permits and other governmental authorizations required for aspects of their businesses; these licenses, permits and governmental authorizations may or may not be in effect, and the Company and the Association may or may not be complying with some laws, rules, and regulations applicable to portions of their businesses; and the Association may or may not be in good standing under some laws and may or may not be qualified as a foreign corporation to transact some business and may or may not be in good standing in all jurisdictions.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing specific affirmations with vague, qualified statements (e.g., 'duly authorized' becomes 'authorized to conduct some business,' 'all material licenses' becomes 'some licenses') weakens the representations and warranties. This makes enforcement more difficult due to increased ambiguity and uncertainty regarding compliance.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Securities Act of 1933 regarding accurate and complete disclosure of material information.
